name: #TezosOutlaws – Pirates – Antony the Silent
description: Antony the Silent/  Some say he doesn't talk because he bit his tongue off to escape interrogators. Others say he took the vow of silence when he was a monk. Antony says nothing. He remains silent. /By Viktor Volodarsky & Octobear Knight, part of "#TezosOutlaws" collection. NFT-buyers may request a Hi-Res PDF, request via outlaws@octobernight.games
